metadata.title: CVE-2021-47051 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:spi: fsl-lpspi: Fix PM reference leak in lpspi_prepare_xfer_hardware()pm_runtime_get_sync will increment pm usage counter even it failed.Forgetting to putting operation will result in reference leak here.Fix it by replacing it with pm_runtime_resume_and_get to keep usagecounter balanced.
